main event: A sighting of a dark ball in the sky with a trailing fire tail was reported near Parkville, Missouri on July 9, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 32 minutes., The object was described as dark with an orange fire tail., Several flashes were seen just prior to the object's disappearance., The observation was made around 2222 hours., The reliability of the observer is unknown and will be followed up with a written report.
sighted object: dark ball with trailing fire tail
